title: Short n' Sweet: 40 Best Shot Glass Desserts
description: Discover 40 of the very best shot glass dessert recipes to serve at your next party or special occasion. Short n’ Sweet brings together a collection of decadent mini desserts that are the perfect addition to any dinner party or buffet table. From puddings to pies, milkshakes to mousse, choose from booze-infused shot glass desserts • Amaretto Mocha Pudding Shots • Carrot Cake Dessert Shooters • Coffee, Choc and Peppermint 5-Minute Mousse • Fireball Whiskey Cheesecake Shots What’s more, there is a selection of decadent short n’ sweet shot glass desserts for the designated driver too. These • Apple Butter Cheesecake Pudding Parfaits • Berry Nice Panna Cotta Pudding Shots • Mango Cream Shots • Red Velvet Cake Milkshake Shooters Looking to impress? Then check out these 40 Shot Glass Dessert recipes that you can serve short n’ sweet, allowing your friends and family to satisfy those sweet cravings in one small shot.
author: Christina Tosch
